keyMoments.title: Muti's Debut - Reunites with Daughter Koala
keyMoments.description: Muti appears for the first time, running out to embrace her daughter Koala after years of separation following Koala's enslavement by the Celestial Dragons.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Koala's mother and creates an emotionally charged reunion scene. However, Muti's later betrayal of Fisher Tiger to the Marines makes this moment tragic in retrospect.

relationships.description: Muti is Koala's mother who was reunited with her daughter when the Sun Pirates returned her home.

evolutionMoments.description: Emotional reunion after Koala's rescue from slavery

reveals.information: Betrayed Fisher Tiger to the Marines in exchange for them not returning Koala to the Celestial Dragons

name.japanese: フィッシャー・タイガー

keyMoments.title: Says Goodbye to Koala
keyMoments.description: Fisher Tiger shares a warm moment with young Koala as she thanks him for saving her life. Despite his deep hatred of humans, he smiles at her kindly.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Tiger still has hope for the next generation and can show compassion to a human child despite his trauma.

keyMoments.title: Refuses Blood Transfusion
keyMoments.description: Mortally wounded, Tiger refuses a life-saving blood transfusion from human donors, stating he cannot accept human blood into his body due to his deep-seated hatred.
keyMoments.significance: This decision seals Tiger's fate and reveals the depth of his psychological trauma from slavery. His hatred overrides even his survival instinct.
keyMoments.quote: I can't... I can't accept their blood... It's tainted with the hatred humans have for us fish-men...

keyMoments.title: Reveals Past as a Slave
keyMoments.description: In his final moments, Tiger reveals to his crew that he was once a slave of the Celestial Dragons, recontextualizing his entire motivation for freeing slaves.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation explains Tiger's character completely - his heroism was born from personal trauma, and his raid on Mary Geoise was also his own escape.
keyMoments.quote: I was a slave... I was branded by the Celestial Dragons and tortured by humans... I tried to forget, but I can't... that's the demon that lives in my heart.

keyMoments.title: Final Words About Peace and the Next Generation
keyMoments.description: Tiger asks his crew not to reveal what happened or pass on their hatred to children, expressing hope that the next generation can achieve true peace.
keyMoments.significance: Tiger's dying wish establishes a core theme of the arc and affects the future actions of Jinbe and the Sun Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Don't tell the island what happened here... Don't pass on this hatred to the children... They need to decide for themselves... what humans truly are.

keyMoments.title: The Death of Fisher Tiger
keyMoments.description: Fisher Tiger, the legendary liberator and founder of the Sun Pirates, dies from blood loss after refusing human blood transfusion.
keyMoments.significance: Tiger's death is a watershed moment that leads to the Sun Pirates splitting, Arlong's villainy, Jinbe becoming a Warlord, and many other major story developments.
keyMoments.quote: I've tried... But I just can't... love a human!!

reveals.information: Was enslaved by the Celestial Dragons and bore their brand
His inability to love humans stems from the trauma of slavery
Died from blood loss after refusing human blood transfusion

keyMoments.title: Displays Lasting Trauma from Slavery
keyMoments.description: Despite being freed and treated kindly by the Sun Pirates, Koala continues to compulsively clean and apologize, showing the deep psychological scars from her enslavement.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lasting impact of slavery and trauma, affecting Fisher Tiger deeply as it reminds him of his own experiences.
keyMoments.quote: I'm sorry! I'll clean better! Please don't kill me!

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Mother Muti
keyMoments.description: Koala is emotionally reunited with her mother Muti on Foolshout Island after being freed from slavery by the Sun Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The reunion provides closure to Koala's rescue arc and sets up the tragic betrayal that follows.

keyMoments.title: Says Goodbye to Fisher Tiger
keyMoments.description: Before parting, Koala runs back to Fisher Tiger to properly thank him for saving her life, creating a touching farewell moment.
keyMoments.significance: This moment shows the bond that formed between Koala and Tiger, and represents Tiger's hope for the next generation to overcome hatred.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you, Tiger! Thank you for saving me!

relationships.description: Koala is Muti's daughter who was enslaved by Celestial Dragons and freed by Fisher Tiger.

evolutionMoments.description: Reunited with her mother after being freed from slavery

relationships.description: Fisher Tiger freed Koala from slavery and returned her home safely.

evolutionMoments.description: Koala says a heartfelt goodbye to Tiger before they part ways forever

keyMoments.title: Fights Rear Admiral Strawberry and Rescues Tiger
keyMoments.description: Jinbe directly confronts and battles Rear Admiral Strawberry while the Sun Pirates rescue their mortally wounded captain.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's loyalty and combat prowess, though the rescue comes too late to save Tiger's life.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Fisher Tiger's Death
keyMoments.description: Jinbe is present as his beloved captain and sworn brother Fisher Tiger dies, unable to save him despite all efforts.
keyMoments.significance: Tiger's death profoundly affects Jinbe and influences his future decisions, including becoming a Warlord to protect freed slaves.

keyMoments.title: Hijacks Marine Battleship
keyMoments.description: During the battle to rescue Fisher Tiger, Arlong takes aggressive action by hijacking one of the Marine battleships and turning it against them.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Arlong's tactical thinking and his deep loyalty to Tiger, while also foreshadowing his aggressive hatred of humans.
keyMoments.quote: You humans think you can kill Big Bro Tiger? I'll show you what happens when you mess with us!

keyMoments.title: Mourns Fisher Tiger's Death
keyMoments.description: Arlong is devastated by Fisher Tiger's death, crying out in anguish as his beloved captain and mentor dies.
keyMoments.significance: Tiger's death radicalizes Arlong and solidifies his hatred of humans, leading to his future villainy in the East Blue.

keyMoments.title: Attempts to Save Tiger with Blood Transfusion
keyMoments.description: As the crew's doctor, Aladine attempts to perform a blood transfusion using human blood to save Fisher Tiger's life, but Tiger refuses the treatment.
keyMoments.significance: Aladine's medical expertise could have saved Tiger if not for Tiger's psychological inability to accept human blood.
